segments.text: Shall we sing with a karaoke ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great idea ! I do it every so often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For us , karaoke is becoming a popular entertainment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . If you are a good singer , your audience will feel comfortable , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can not agree with you more . And if you are an awful one , that will be funny .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I remembered Tom is always out of tune . We burst into laughter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that true ? Shall we invite him to join with us ?
segments.speaker: S1
